item.title: Exponential, Logarithmic and Hyperbolic Functions
item.description:
Exponential, Logarithmic and Hyperbolic Functions

Exercise 1 : Basic Exponent Rules

Calculate the terms given in the next questions or give a transformation:

  1. $a^{-n}$
  2. $27^{\frac{1}{3}}$
  3. $a^{\frac{1}{n}}$
  4. $(0,1)^0$
  5. $(y^3)^2$
  6. $x^{-\frac{3}{2}}$
  7. $10^3 \cdot 10^{-3} \cdot 10^2$
  8. $3^{-3}$

Exercise 2 : Roots and Powers

Calculate the terms given in the next questions or give a transformation:

  1. $(\sqrt{2})^2$
  2. $e^{\frac{1}{10}}$
  3. $(\ln 2)^0$
  4. $\sqrt{5} \cdot \sqrt{7}$
  5. $(0,5)^2 \cdot (0,5)^{-4} \cdot (0,5)^0$
  6. $\sqrt{8} \cdot \sqrt{3}$

Exercise 3 : Common Logarithms (base 10)

Calculate the terms given in the next questions or give a transformation:
